<p>
  <button>I am a button</button>
  <a href="#" class="btn">I am a link</a>
  <input type="submit" value="I am a submit form element" />
</p>
<p>
  <a href="#" class="btn btn-lg">I am a large button</a>
  <a href="#" class="btn btn-sm">I am a small button</a>
</p>

<p>
  <a href="#" class="btn btn-full">I am a full width button</a>
</p>

<p>
  <button disabled>I am disabled using a disabled attribute</button>
  <button class="btn btn-disabled">I am disabled using a disabled class</button>
</p>

<p>
  <a href="#" class="btn btn-icon"><i class="icon icon-fave-add"></i>Add to Favorites</a>
  <a href="#" class="btn btn-icon"><i class="icon icon-fave-remove"></i>Remove Favorite</a>
</p>
